quiz.question: Which of the following best describes the difference between MIS and DSS?
options: MIS provides routine info, DSS supports non-routine decisions
DSS is for data entry only
quiz.correct_answer: MIS provides routine info, DSS supports non-routine decisions

quiz.question: What is a major challenge in implementing management information systems?
Which regulation is most relevant to information privacy?
What is the main advantage of integrating MIS with other business systems?
